## Bee.makeFeedReader() method

Make a new feed reader for downloading feed updates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
makeFeedReader(topic: Topic | Uint8Array | string, owner: EthAddress | Uint8Array | string, options?: BeeRequestOptions): FeedReader;
```
